themes.description: This theme covers overall positive or negative comments about the platform's general usability, suitability, or user experience that don't fit specific functional areas.
Requests for new features, tools, or enhancements related to trading, investment analysis, or app functionality.
Problems related to account opening, verification, KYC, account access, or account management.
Concerns about account security, data privacy, unauthorized transactions, fraud, or scam allegations.
Reviews expressing general satisfaction or positive experiences with the app.
Reviews suggesting new features, enhancements, or product improvements for the application.
This theme covers requests for new app functionalities, missing features, or enhancements to existing user interface elements.
This theme covers complaints about the app's usability, complexity of processes, or difficulty in navigating features.
Requests or issues related to services and features specifically for Non-Resident Indian (NRI) users.
Suggestions for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or enhancements to the user interface.
This theme covers complaints about the application's user interface, design, navigation, and overall ease of use. It addresses issues where features are present but difficult to access or understand.
This theme includes reviews requesting new functionalities, enhancements to existing features, or complaints about the absence of desired tools within the application.
Covers issues related to managing personal account details, profile updates, KYC, and account settings.
Concerns about the app's legitimacy, security, or trustworthiness, including accusations of being fake or holding funds without justification.
Requests for specific account details, statements, or historical data.
This theme covers feedback and requests related to promotional offers, loyalty programs, discounts, or special incentives for customers.
Covers issues related to the application's user interface, visual design, navigation, and overall user experience.
Covers issues and feedback related to how financial data, returns, investments, and other portfolio information are displayed and organized within the application.

This theme covers feedback and requests related to the variety and availability of investment products and services offered by the platform, such as fixed deposits, specific funds, or other financial instruments.
Complaints related to app advertisements, such as intrusive ads, frequency, or relevance, that impact user experience outside the app.
General feedback about the app's overall quality, usability, or user satisfaction.
Feedback or complaints regarding the quality, usability, or design of existing features and tools.
This theme covers complaints about the app's general usefulness, the quality or accuracy of information provided, and its overall value proposition.
This theme addresses user accusations or suspicions of fraudulent activities, scams, or unethical practices by the platform or its services.
Issues or requests related to account-specific functionalities like nominee management, profile updates, or account settings.
Problems with generating, accessing, or the quality of financial statements, reports, or other official documents.
This theme covers feedback regarding the platform's ability to provide useful insights, recommendations, or tools that assist users in making informed investment decisions and stock selection.
This theme covers reviews that express overall satisfaction or positive general comments about the service or application without specifying a particular feature or area.
